NF.Q: In the column Market Segments of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 16028? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Commodities to node Low Risk and from node Value Investing to node Low Return, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Commodities to node Low Risk and from node Hedge Funds to node Index Fund Investing, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Value Investing to node High Return, from node Index Fund Investing to node High Return, and from node Cryptocurrency to node Moderate Risk, which path has the largest flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Moderate Risk to node Institutional Investors, from node Institutional Investors to node Value Investing, and from node Hedge Funds to node Index Fund Investing, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Real Estate to target node Low Return? Please list all node labels along this path.
